FuncDef:
The aaa normal-offline-record command enables a Router to generate normal-user-offline records.
The undo aaa normal-offline-record command disables a Router from generating normal-user-offline records.
By default, the Router is enabled to generate normal-user-offline records.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a user needs to analyze logout reasons, run the aaa normal-offline-record command to enable a Router to generate normal-user-offline records.
